full_text:

Deb, we are all chosen, it just depends on how much time and dedication you want to spend as a serious Box Researcher!   Welcome aboard!!!  Looking forward to hearing your files!
   
  Juli

Debbie Tejada <debbie@...> wrote:
          Thanks Bruce, I'll certainly need some answers once I get started
digging thru the posts more. I'm tempted to do the Shack Hack, I've
seen Frank's Box in use a few times in person and can't quite get the
knack for understanding the messages yet. I need some practice! I ran
into Chip Coffee earlier this month, he's supposedly one of the few
"chosen" people who are supposed to be able to work with it. I asked
him how it felt to be one of the "chosen ones" and he laughed.
